title: The naughtiest outfits at Paris Hilton's super-sexy Halloween party!
text:
Advertisement

Halloween may be all about things that go bump in the night.

But for some people, it's also about embracing their naughty side.

Take a look at some of the super-sexy outfits worn by guests attending Hilton's star-studded bash in Beverly Hills on Thursday night.

Too hot for Halloween! There were plenty of seriously sexy costumes at Paris Hilton's Halloween bash on Thursday night

As to be expected, there were plenty of sexy angels and demons in attendance.

One woman brought a heavenly touch to the bash with lacy white lingerie, thigh-high stockings, and large wings.

Another angel headed to the party in glittering thigh-high boots, a teeny tiny bra, thong underwear, and body jewelry.

She too wore wings and a fluffy white halo.

Naughty angel: A woman wore a lace white lingerie, thigh-high stockings, and caped wings

Heaven and hell! There were a plethora of sexy angels and demons at the bash

Cheeky! The angel strutted about wearing thong underwear and body jewelry

Velvet sensation: One attendee left little to the imagination in a burgundy jumpsuit with exposed sides

In addition to the angels, there were also demons.

One woman was looking devilish in a completely sheer outfit with devil horns and thigh-high stockings.

There were also some more mysterious styles on display.

Spreading her wings: Another guest appeared to be dressed as a Victoria's Secret Angel

Red-y for a good time! One woman flashed plenty of leg as she came dressed as Jessica Rabbit

The cat's meow! Kylie Jenner's BFF Anastasia Karanikolaou brought the va va voom as Catwoman

Me-wow! The star flashed her backside while working the sexy ensemble

Party time! Paris worked the crowd dressed in a super heroine inspired costume

Bottom's up! A woman wore next to nothing as she headed to the bash beside EJ Johnson

Like many of the others, one attendee left very little to the imagination in a vampy velvet jumpsuit with lace-up sides.

Another guest was looking pretty tough in a sheer snake print crop top with mesh stockings and knee-high boots.

Paris got into the spooky spirit of things Thursday night alongside a host of other stars.

The heiress hosted a Halloween bash in Beverly Hills, with the likes of Larsa Pippen, Shanina Shaik, Brooklyn Beckham, Dorothy Wang, and EJ Johnson in attendance.

Hell for leather! Rich Kids Of Beverly Hills star Dorothy Wang worked a black leather number with red fishnet stockings

Double trouble! Larsa Pippen was definitely dressed to turn heads as she headed to the bash with Shanina Shaik
description: Take a look at some of the naughtiest outfits worn by guests attending Paris Hilton's star-studded Halloween bash in Beverly Hills on Thursday night.
